item.title: Integration Testing AWS Lambda
item.description: Integration Testing Lambda Functions Locally Never had to test AWS Lambda functions locally (test in production YOLO). While walking through the docs with a colleague, we found that the nifty way to test a lambda function created using SAM is to run: $ sam local start-lambda In the directory where you have your SAM template.yml. This is LambdaInvoking the function, as opposed to passing it an event via API Gateway.
